A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not since Phantom Menace has a Star Wars movie been so dissapointing. They offer fans beauty and amazing reunions\, but they offer movie goers tropes\, deus ex machinas and plot-holes. From Princess Lea's unexplained space flights to every character being saved inexplicably (Finn on some rising something after being thrown off a ledge)\, the movie thinks it's audience is stupid and will look past the faults just to see a Luke and Lea reunion. I don't recall disagreeing with critics so much!
